title: A step-by-step guide to switch to gpt-4o safely with Helicone
title1: A step-by-step guide to switch to gpt-4o safely with Helicone
title2: A step-by-step guide to switch to gpt-4o safely with Helicone
description: Learn how to use Helicone's experiments feature to regression test using production data, compare prompts and seamlessly switch to gpt-4o without impacting users.
author: Scott Nguyen
